Title: Repeals certain requirements for a petition for a judicial appointment of a standby guardian of an infant; repealer
Summary: Repeals certain requirements for a petition for a judicial appointment of a standby guardian of an infant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to requirements for a petition for a judicial appointment of a standby guardian of an infant; and to repeal subparagraph (ii) of paragraph (b) of subdivision 3 of section 1726 of the surrogate's court procedure act, relating thereto
